attributes.action: Request in parliament court prison sentences 36 years peadophiles minimum life

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

Longer sentences for child sex offenders, sex offenders and rapists: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323338

You could start a new petition asking for minimum life sentences for acid attacks, if that's also something that you'd like to see.
